  • Constructor Details

    • Order

      public Order​(int orderID, int staffID, int tableId, int pax, boolean isActive)
      This constructor initializes order id, staff ID, table ID, number of Pax and the payment status of the order
      Parameters:
      orderID - order ID
      staffID - staff's ID who serve this order
      tableId - the table ID
      pax - specifies number of customers
      isActive - specifies payment status of this order

    • getIsActive

      public boolean getIsActive()
      This is the accessor method of isActive field.
      Returns:
      payment status of this order. True means this order hasn't been paid

      public void addOrderItem​(int menuItemId, int quantity, java.lang.String name, double price)
      The method adds the order item to the order
      Parameters:
      menuItemId - the ID of this order in the menu item
      name - the name of this order item
      price - the price of this order item
